summary: This is an email chain from August 5, 2020, forwarding a report regarding Deutsche Bank (ODAG-DB) and referencing an anticipated action related to a subpoena. The email includes an attachment titled '2020.08.05_Deutsche_Bank_Urgent_Report.docx' and indicates the sender is using an iPhone.

events.title: Deutsche Bank Report Forwarded
events.description: An email chain is forwarded containing a report for ODAG-DB (likely Office of the Deputy Attorney General - Deutsche Bank) and discussion about an anticipated action related to a subpoena.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated August 5, 2020, concerning a report related to Deutsche Bank (ODAG-DB).
An attachment titled '2020.08.05_Deutsche_Bank_Urgent_Report.docx' is included, suggesting an urgent matter.
The email references an anticipated action 'to go up this morning' in relation to a subpoena, indicating ongoing legal proceedings.
The sender notes a misspelling of 'Deutsche' in the original message.
The correspondence appears to be internal forwarding of sensitive information regarding a bank investigation.
